On Jul 29, 2007, at 11:48 AM, Ilja Preuss wrote:

> ...
>
> > A framework like Guice gives you the power to solve all these  
> problems
> > while giving you a lot of control on the lifecycle of your  
> objects and
> > flexibility in your design. It's odd that Rob doesn't even  
> mention it
> > in this article.
>
> I'm not Uncle Bob, but I'd guess that his goal with the article was to
> show a simple alternative to the Singleton pattern, not to explore the
> whole solution space for the problem.

Also, Bob's article has been around a while. It predates the  
emergence of DI frameworks.
